segments.text: I see two children involved in some secret activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy climbing on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just make out "COOKIE JAR" written on a large jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is standing next to him, eagerly reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, and I'm genuinely worried he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, just a few feet away, completely oblivious to this daring heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels like an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, but with real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The precarious balance is making me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
